briefdescription.para: All LexicalEntry instances are maintained by Lexicon There is one or more LexicalEntry instances per Lexicon.

detaileddescription.para:
Lexicon instances are owned by LexicalResource.
A Lexicon instance.

parameterdescription.para: The absolute path to audio files to set.

briefdescription.para: Get all lexical entries maintained by the lexicon.

simplesect.para: A Python set of lexical entries.

briefdescription.para: Add a lexical entry to the lexicon.

parameterdescription.para: A LexicalEntry instance to add to the Lexicon.

briefdescription.para: Remove a lexical entry from the lexicon.

parameterdescription.para: The LexicalEntry instance to remove from the Lexicon.

briefdescription.para: Count number of lexical entries of the lexicon.

simplesect.para: The number of lexical entries without duplicates maintained by the lexicon.

briefdescription.para: Sort similar given items of lexical entries contained in the lexicon according to their homonym number.

parameterdescription.para: Lambda function giving the item to sort. Default value is 'lambda lexical_entry: lexical_entry.get_lexeme()', which means that the items to sort are lexemes.
Lambda function giving a condition to apply classification.

simplesect.para: The sorted Python list of lexical entries.

briefdescription.para: Sort given items of lexical entries contained in the lexicon according to a certain order.

parameterdescription.para: Lambda function giving the item to sort. Default value is 'lambda lexical_entry: lexical_entry.get_lexeme()', which means that the items to sort are lexemes.
Default value is 'None', which means that the lexicographical ordering uses the ASCII ordering.
Function to compare items. If 'None', a default function to compare character by character is provided.

simplesect.para: The sorted Python list of lexical entries.

briefdescription.para: Find all lexical entries which characteristics meet the given condition.

parameterdescription.para: Function or lambda function taking a lexical entry as argument, and returning True or False; for instance 'lambda lexical_entry: lexical_entry.get_lexeme() == "Hello"'.

simplesect.para: A Python list of LexicalEntry instances.

briefdescription.para: Check all cross-references in the lexicon.

detaileddescription.para:
Fill the private attribute '__lexicalEntry' of each RelatedForm instance for all lexical entries.
Lexicon instance.

briefdescription.para: Reset boolean to be able to check all cross-references in the lexicon again.

detaileddescription.para:
Reset the private attribute '__checked'.
Lexicon instance.

para.verbatim: This method converts the lexicon into LaTeX format.

briefdescription.para: "Lexicon is a class containing all the lexical entries of a given language within the entire resource." (LMF)
